Description: Limestone ostracon; figure of Jonas standing with arms raised.
Bibliographic references: Godlewski 1986 / Le monastère de St Phoibammon (p.108, fig.45)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (83883) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/83883)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.93)
Exhibition history: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil' 2015-2016, Oct 29-Feb 7, London, BM, G35, Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs.
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Deir el-Bahari dessin 1 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
